attributes.action: Stop mayor of London to charge congestion charge to private hire driver
attributes.additional_details: This means that PHVs will need to pay the Congestion Charge if they travel within the charging Zone during charging hours (7am - 6pm, Monday to Friday).
attributes.background: Please know that previously, private hire vehicles (PHVs) were exempt from paying the Congestion Charge. However, TfL announced yesterday (19th December 2018) that from 8th April 2019, PHVs will no longer be exempt.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The London congestion charge is the responsibility of the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/about-us/london-assembly/petitions
